name: wetting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
wet
to make something wet: Wet the powder thoroughly and mix to remove lumps. He wetted a dishcloth and tried to rub the mark away. wet yourself
to urinate in your clothes by accident wet the/your bed
to urinate in your bed by accident: She still sometimes wets the bed at night.
